<sw-text-editor>
Info

Less variables

Variable nameValue
@sw-text-editor-color-border #D8DDE6
@sw-text-editor-color-label #54698D
@sw-text-editor-color-toolbar #9aa8b5
@sw-text-editor-color-toolbar-bg #f4f7fa
@sw-text-editor-color-toolbar-hover #189EFF
@sw-text-editor-font 'Source Sans Pro', 'Helvetica Neue', 'Helvetica', 'Arial', sans-serif

Twig blocks

Block nameContent
sw_text_editor_label 
<div class="sw-text-editor__label" v-if="label.length">{{ label }}</div>
sw_text_editor_editor 
<div class="editor" ref="editor"></div>
sw_text_editor_sub_toolbar 
<div class="editor__sub-toolbar">
  <sw-container grid="1fr" justify="right">
    <span class="editor__text-length">{{ $tc('global.sw-text-editor.labelTextLength', textLength, { count: textLength }) }}</span>
  </sw-container>
</div>
sw_text_editor 
<div class="sw-text-editor">
  <div class="sw-text-editor__label" v-if="label.length">{{ label }}</div>
  <div class="editor" ref="editor"></div>
  <div class="editor__sub-toolbar">
    <sw-container grid="1fr" justify="right">
      <span class="editor__text-length">{{ $tc('global.sw-text-editor.labelTextLength', textLength, { count: textLength }) }}</span>
    </sw-container>
  </div>
</div>
